metadata.name: Visibility
metadata.schema: {"title":"Visibility","description":"Flag to indicate if the service is visible in API Center portal","type":"boolean"}

metadata.name: Categories
metadata.schema: {"title":"Categories","description":"Category classification for the API","type":"array","items":{"type":"string","oneOf":[{"const":"Productivity","description":"Productivity"},{"const":"Developer Tools","description":"Developer Tools"},{"const":"AI/ML","description":"AI/ML"},{"const":"OpenAI","description":"OpenAI"},{"const":"Data & Analytics","description":"Data & Analytics"},{"const":"Security","description":"Security"},{"const":"Communication","description":"Communication"},{"const":"Business Intelligence","description":"Business Intelligence"},{"const":"Integration","description":"Integration"},{"const":"Search","description":"Search"},{"const":"Model Inference","description":"Model Inference"},{"const":"LLM","description":"LLM"},{"const":"Multi-Provider","description":"Multi-Provider"},{"const":"Real-time","description":"Real-time"},{"const":"Document Processing","description":"Document Processing"},{"const":"Sample","description":"Sample"},{"const":"Weather","description":"Weather"},{"const":"Other","description":"Other"}]}}

metadata.name: Endpoint
metadata.schema: {"title":"Endpoint","description":"The endpoint type and location of the API","type":"string","oneOf":[{"const":"Public","description":"Public"},{"const":"Private Azure","description":"Private Azure"},{"const":"Private On-premises","description":"Private On-premises"}]}

metadata.name: Type
metadata.schema: {"title":"Type","description":"Defines the architectural pattern and accessibility model of the API service","type":"string","oneOf":[{"const":"Remote Internal","description":"Internal remote backend service"},{"const":"Remote Public","description":"Publicly accessible remote backend service"},{"const":"Remote","description":"Remote backend service"},{"const":"AI Gateway","description":"Service that is governed by AI Gateway"},{"const":"AI Service","description":"Azure AI Service"},{"const":"Sample API","description":"Sample or demonstration API"}]}

metadata.name: Icon
metadata.schema: {"title":"Icon","description":"URL to the icon image for the API","type":"string","format":"uri"}

metadata.name: securitySchemes
metadata.schema: {"title":"securitySchemes","description":"API Security Schemes","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"title":"name","description":"Name of the API Security Scheme","type":"string"},"type":{"type":"string","title":"type","description":"The Type of the API Security Scheme","oneOf":[{"const":"http","description":"Basic, Bearer and other HTTP authentications schemes"},{"const":"apiKey","description":"API keys and cookie authentication"},{"const":"oauth2","description":"OAuth 2.0 is the industry-standard protocol for authorization."},{"const":"openIdConnect ","description":"OpenID Connect Discovery"}]},"authorizationurl":{"title":"authorizationUrl","type":"string","format":"uri"}},"required":["name","type"]}}
